
# Changelog

## 1.3.0 (2017-08-15)

  * Support URLs in the `--labels` flag

## 1.2.1 (2017-05-16)

  * Support repositories with a lot of labels

## 1.2.0 (2016-04-25)

  * Update the default label set
    * Add "status: good starter issue"
    * Add "type: breaking"
    * Add "type: discussion"
    * Add alias for "status: wontfix"

## 1.1.0 (2016-03-15)

  * Update the default label set
    * Add alias for "status: help wanted"

## 1.0.0 (2016-03-15)

  * Initial release
